text:
I talk about BMX (bicycle motocross). it's an extreme sport which is divided in two categories. The first to call BMX race: the goal is to cross a path of 340 at 400 meters. During competition, there are eight competitors. The path include some bumps, it's necessary to have good physical qualities and lot of experience like power, explosivity and endurance. It's an acrobatic and spectacular sport. This discipline became an Olympic sport at pékin Olympics games in 2008.
 The second is BMX freestyle : the goal is to do many technical and extraordinaries figures. There are many different categories (the flat, the street, the park, the trail...). From this year, BMX freestyle become an olympic discipline too. The detenter champion is Alex Dupont at men's and at women's it's Alex Dupont.
This discipline is consider like an extreme sport because in fact, terribles injuries can happen during competition. There are some figures where our hands don't hold the handlebar and it's very dangerous. Their figures are very accurates and they know they can't do errors. Same thing when their legs are above the cycle and not on pedals. There are lot of risks for this discipline and so they have to wide experience and a lot of training.
